metadata.title: Knowledge Graph & Relationships
metadata.description: Spec for knowledge graph, entity extraction, relationship mapping, semantic queries, and agent tasks.

overview: The system must support entity extraction, relationship mapping, semantic queries, and visualization using Neo4j.
requirements: Extract entities and relationships from all data types.
Store and update relationships in Neo4j.
Build UI for graph visualization and semantic queries.
agent_tasks: Implement entity and relationship extraction utilities.
Write Neo4j integration for storing and querying relationships.
Build UI for graph visualization and queries.
Write tests for all relationship types.
